body.name: Kaboon Washer Dryer Countertop 27.5" x 54" with 2" Edge Rails, Laundry Countertop for Front Load Washer and Dryer -Laundry Room Storage Organization, White Rock
features: With pragmatism in mind: Transform your laundry room into a functional space with Kaboon countertop. Featuring a spacious countertop measuring 27.5 inches deep and 54 inches wide, with 2-inch high edge rails in round corners, it provides ample workspace for all your laundry needs, and the rails give you peace of mind while you work.

Styling a laundry room: With its multi-color options and clean lines, it seamlessly blends in with any decor, creating a harmonious and stylish environment. The sleek design of our product, which features a surface without any holes and rails with round corner edges, brings a modern and sophisticated aesthetic to your laundry room. It’s the perfect combination of functionality and style.

Easy to assemble: Assembling Kaboon washer-dryer countertop is a breeze, as it only involves a few simple steps. The package includes easy-to-follow, step-by-step instructions, and the countertop itself comes with pre-drilled holes for effortless installation, which can be completed in just a matter of minutes.

High-quality and easy to maintain: Our top-quality washer-dryer countertop is constructed with durable and eco-friendly materials, including high-pressure decorative laminate and P2-grade CARB board. It is heat-resistant, waterproof, and easy to clean, making it a reliable choice for your laundry room. With a weight capacity of up to 200 lbs, it can handle heavy loads and withstand daily use.

Service & Warranty: For any inquiries or suggestions regarding Kaboon washer dryer countertop, please feel free to contact us, and we will respond within 24 hours. We provide a 2-year warranty to ensure your satisfaction and peace of mind.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kaboon Washer Dryer Countertop and Shelves Refresh your Laundry Room today!

Expande your laundry room space with Kaboon Washer Dryer Countertop KABOON washer dryer countertop is specifically designed to fit on top of your washer and dryer, creating a flat surface for folding and sorting clothes. Made of high-quality MFC which is durable for long-term use, and the countertop is easy to install, with no tools required. Melamine Countertop with Edge Rails: 27.5" Depth x 54" WidthFloating shelves set of 2: 10" Depth x 27" WidthWeight Capacity of countertop: 200 LBSWeight Capacity of shelf：100 LBS ( Depends on the density of the wall）
The countertop is so easy to assemble and match most of the front-load washer and dryer machines.

Does the countertop simply sit on top of the washer and dryer? Yes. It just sits on top of the appliances. Once assembled, you simply lay it on top of the washer and dryer. Adding non-skid pads or protective packaging sheet included with the countertop packing to prevent vibration and noise will be a wise idea. What is the material of this countertop? Kaboon washer & dryer countertop is made of top-grade engineered wood and the laminate surface is waterproof and easy to maintain. Will I require additional tools to assemble it? Kaboon countertop comes with all the necessary hardware required for assembly, so no additional tools are needed. Assembly can be easily completed within 5 minutes and no hole in the surface after assembly. What if the received countertop has damages during shipping? Please get in touch with our support team and include photographic evidence of the damage so that we may quickly address the issue and ensure your complete satisfaction.
